citeinfo.title: vmrc
citeinfo.othercit: The Conservation Lands Database is constantly being added to and updated. Data is released to the public quarterly and posted to the download section of the website.

descript.abstract: This dataset contains the boundaries for state owned tidal lands.
descript.purpose: Statewide GIS coverage of state owned tidal lands.

theme.themekt: REQUIRED: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of theme keywords.

cntinfo.cntinst: Please contact VA-DCR if you have comments about the database, data to provide, corrections to make, or any other input. We appreciate you assistance in keeping our database up to date.

overview.dsoverv:
The Department of Conservation and Recreation has developed a statewide "Conservation Lands" database. This database includes mapped boundaries and certain characteristics of public and certain private lands in Virginia that have potential significance for serving a variety of conservation, recreation, and open-space roles. Included are many federal and state lands, parks and undeveloped or partially-developed lands owned by localities, lands owned as preserves by non-profit conservation organizations such as The Nature Conservancy, and conservation easements held by the Virginia Outdoors Foundation, land trusts and others. Digital boundaries were collected from the landowner or managing agency when available; DCR Natural Heritage Program staff delineated unmapped boundaries using the best available sources. This Geographic Information System (GIS) is in ArcView shapefile format and can be viewed, queried and manipulated using appropriate GIS software.
The Conservation Lands Database is designed to meet the Commonwealth's need for a comprehensive GIS data layer identifying Virginia's "conservation lands". State resource agencies, universities, land trusts, conservation organizations, and regional and local governments will find it invaluable for conservation and recreation planning. This database will also serve agencies with economic development interests including the Virginia Economic Development Partnership, planning district commissions, and localities.

distinfo.distliab: Although all data referred to in this documentation have been used by the VADCR, no warranty, expressed or implied, is made by the VADCR, or the original data sources as to the accuracy of the data. The act of distribution shall not constitute any such warranty, and no responsibility is assumed by the VADCR in the use of these data. Users must assume responsibility to determine the use of these data. The boundaries are not to be used for a LEGAL definition of these areas. Please contact the proper management agency with questions concerning land management and policies. Contact the original data provider for original metadata or questions about the placement and creation of boundary lines. The re-distribution of this dataset for profit is prohibited.

cntorgp.cntorg: REQUIRED: The organization responsible for the metadata information.
cntorgp.cntper: REQUIRED: The person responsible for the metadata information.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

cntinfo.cntvoice: REQUIRED: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.1.0.780

procstep.procdesc: All digital boundaries were geo-referenced (if necessary) and projected to decimal degrees/geographic, NAD83. Attributes were standardized and new fields were added. Refer to original datasets for the original attributes. No boundaries received in digital format were corrected to eliminate overlap with other holdings, etc. Any maniipulation to existing boundaries is described in the lineage section. DCR ownership boundaries were digitized using best available sources. Please see bndorigin and bndaccuracy attribute fields for more detailed information per boundary.

dataqual.logic: The Conservation Lands database iincludes property boundaries created by DCR and a variety of other sources. Source boundaries are not edge matched unless they are created by DCR. Polygon overlap and other toplogical inconsistencies are likely. Please reference the boundary accuracy assessment code if overlap is of particular concern in an area of interest.

attracc.attraccr: This dataset is a work in progress and represents our most up to date attribute information.

horizpa.horizpar: This layer should meet National Map Accuracy Standards for 1:24000 Digital Raster Graphics (DRG). Thus, mapped features should be within 12.2 meters of the true locations for about 90% of the features tested.

vertacc.vertaccr: This layer should meet National Map Accuracy Standards for 1:24000 Digital Raster Graphics (DRG). Thus, mapped features should be within 12.2 meters of the true locations for about 90% of the features tested.
